# Josh Hornby

> Personal blog on software engineering, engineering leadership, and building products.

Written by Josh Hornby, an engineering leader based in the UK. Posts cover practical lessons from building software teams and products, with a focus on real experience over theory.

## Links

- [About]({{ site.url }}/about): Background on Josh Hornby
- [Start Here]({{ site.url }}/start-here): Curated introduction to the best posts by topic

## Recent Posts

{% endfor %}

## Topics

- Engineering leadership and team management
- AI/LLM integration patterns
- Product management and project planning
- Software architecture and technical decisions
